text: Tower Hamlets Local Plan 483 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS z Proposals on this site should be in accordance with the principles of the South Poplar Masterplan SPD. This has been developed between landowners and the council in order to positively address the social, economic and environmental disparities between Poplar and Canary Wharf.
